mainText:
I am deeply sorry for the lost of such a visionary and amazing man that Steve Jobs was. He has changed the world and mine with his innovations 
and products. Jobs has made our lives much easier and I hope that his 
principles and thoughts that Jobs used in his creations will continue to 
thrive in the years to come. I wish the best to the Jobs family and those who were side by side with him.
author: King
